name: Debian the Gray
description: Turn some of the Debian websites (developer related) dark gray, usable at night and with tired eyes. If you happen to have patches to improve some more Debian's sites, please send them my way!
additional_info:
2022-01-02
* Apply the style to a few more text-only (build log) URLs.
* Handle h4 and h5 elements that are used by wiki.debian.org

2018-10-01
* Quite more sites supported.

2017-04-02
* Support more sites.
* Change the colour of monospaced words in wiki.debian.org.

2017-05-21
* Initial upload.
